mapper.select: select temp, (CASE WHEN INSTR(DATE_FORMAT(today, '%m-%d %h:%i'), 'PM') > 0 THEN REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(today, '%m-%d %h:%i'), 'PM', '오후') ELSE REPLACE(DATE_FORMAT(today, '%m-%d %h:%i'), 'AM', '오전') END) AS today from bb_test where today > (now() - interval 1 minute) order by today asc limit 1;
select temp from bb_test order by today desc limit 1;
